mapper.sql: a.t_WalletTxn_ID, a.t_WalletTxn_QRcode, a.t_WalletTxn_Num, a.t_WalletTxn_Vendor, a.t_WalletTxn_ClearNum, a.t_WalletTxn_ClearOrg, a.t_WalletTxn_PayerName, a.t_WalletTxn_PayerID, a.t_WalletTxn_PayerPID, a.t_WalletTxn_ReceiverName, a.t_WalletTxn_ReceiverID, a.t_WalletTxn_ReceiverPID, a.t_WalletTxn_Mobile, a.t_WalletTxn_TxnCat, a.t_WalletTxn_TxnCurrencyType, a.t_WalletTxn_TxnDate, a.t_WalletTxn_ProdName, a.t_WalletTxn_PayDays, a.t_WalletTxn_CreditPayCurrentNum, a.t_WalletTxn_TotTxnAmount, a.t_WalletTxn_TopupAmt, a.t_WalletTxn_CryptoTxnAmt, a.t_WalletTxn_DebitTxnAmt, a.t_WalletTxn_CreditTxnAmt, a.t_WalletTxn_CreditBalanceNum, a.t_WalletTxn_CreditTxnAmtInit, a.t_WalletTxn_TotalPrepayAmt, a.t_WalletTxn_TotallvorchourAmt, a.t_WalletTxn_TotalInterestDays, a.t_WalletTxn_TxnCounts, a.t_WalletTxn_Interest, a.t_WalletTxn_ProductName, a.t_WalletTxn_ProductID, a.t_WalletTxn_Amt3, a.t_WalletTxn_BalanceCreditNum, a.t_WalletTxn_OverdueRepaymentDate, a.t_WalletTxn_PayClear, a.t_WalletTxn_Overdue, a.t_WalletTxn_OverdueDays, a.t_WalletTxn_OverdueTotalAmount, a.t_WalletTxn_FinancialInterest, a.t_WalletTxn_ServiceFee, a.t_WalletTxn_Poundage, a.t_WalletTxn_TierPoundage, a.t_WalletTxn_discountamt, a.t_WalletTxn_bkp1, a.t_WalletTxn_InterestMargin, a.t_WalletTxn_BankAccName, a.t_WalletTxn_BankAcc, a.t_WalletTxn_SysUpdateDate, a.t_WalletTxn_Paystatus, a.t_WalletTxn_SMS, a.t_WalletTxn_SMSRec, a.t_WalletTxn_type, a.t_WalletTxn_Txt1, a.t_WalletTxn_Txt2, a.t_WalletTxn_Txt3, a.t_WalletTxn_Txt4, a.t_WalletTxn_Txt5, a.platform, a.remark, a.creator, a.create_time, a.modifier, a.modify_time
mapper.select:
select
from t_ewallettxn_info a where a.t_P_id = #{t_P_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.create_time
select sum(t_P_CreditPrepayAmount) from t_ewallettxn_info a where a.t_P_Company = #{t_P_Company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from t_ewallettxn_info a where a.t_P_VendorEmployeeName = #{t_P_VendorCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by a.t_P_Company

select
from t_ewallettxn_info a where a.t_P_Company = #{t_P_Company,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by a.t_P_VendorEmployeeName

select
from t_ewallettxn_info a where
a.t_P_Name like CONCAT('%',#{t_P_Name},'%')
and a.t_P_PID like CONCAT('%',#{t_P_PID},'%')
and a.t_P_Mobil like CONCAT('%',#{t_P_Mobil},'%')
and a.t_P_Company like CONCAT('%',#{t_P_Company},'%')
and a.t_P_VendorEmployeeName like CONCAT('%',#{t_P_VendorEmployeeName},'%')
and a.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
order by a.create_time

select
from t_ewallettxn_info a where
a.t_P_VendorEmployeeName like CONCAT('%',#{t_P_VendorEmployeeName},'%')
and a.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
group by a.t_P_Company

mapper.update:
update t_ewallettxn_info
t_P_id = #{t_P_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_Name = #{t_P_Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_Sex = #{t_P_Sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_Age = #{t_P_Age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t_P_PID = #{t_P_PID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_Marriage = #{t_P_Marriage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_HomeAddress = #{t_P_HomeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_Mobil = #{t_P_Mobil,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_Phone = #{t_P_Phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_Spouse = #{t_P_Spouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_Spouse_Phone = #{t_P_Spouse_Phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_Contact1 = #{t_P_Contact1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_Contact1Mobil = #{t_P_Contact1Mobil,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_Contact2 = #{t_P_Contact2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_Contact2Mobil = #{t_P_Contact2Mobil,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_Company = #{t_P_Company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_CompanyNum = #{t_P_CompanyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_SocialSecurityBaseAmount = #{t_P_SocialSecurityBaseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t_P_ProvidentFund = #{t_P_ProvidentFund,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t_P_Employmentstatus = #{t_P_Employmentstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_EmploymentCategory = #{t_P_EmploymentCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_WorkYears = #{t_P_WorkYears,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t_P_Probation = #{t_P_Probation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_VendorEmployment = #{t_P_VendorEmployment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_VendorEmployeeName = #{t_P_VendorEmployeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_PayrollDebitcardBankName = #{t_P_PayrollDebitcardBankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_PayrollDebitcardNum = #{t_P_PayrollDebitcardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_P_NetBaseSalary = #{t_P_NetBaseSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t_P_CreditPrepaySalaryAmount = #{t_P_CreditPrepaySalaryAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t_P_PayrollDate = #{t_P_PayrollDate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t_P_NetMonthlyBonusAmount = #{t_P_NetMonthlyBonusAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t_P_NetBonusPayDate = #{t_P_NetBonusPayDate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t_P_SocialSecurityDate = #{t_P_SocialSecurityDate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
t_P_SysUpdateDate = #{t_P_SysUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
platform = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where t_P_id = #{t_P_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_ewallettxn_info
t_P_Employmentstatus = "onjob"
where t_ewallettxn_info.t_P_Company = #{t_TreasuryDB_OrgName_get,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t_ewallettxn_info.t_P_Mobil not in ( select mobile from t_manager where t_manager.`status` = 0 ) and t_ewallettxn_info.t_P_Employmentstatus = "PENDING"

update t_ewallettxn_info
t_P_Employmentstatus = "PENDING"
where t_P_Company = #{t_TreasuryDB_OrgName_get,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t_P_Employmentstatus = "onjob"
